description: ﻿A wild-eyed mob emerges from the streets and attacks you.
A shoot-out emerges where you are caught in the middle of it.
A colleague ratted you out for anti-communist behavior.
A gang kidnaps you and asks you to pay them money.
Your quota is off by one person for the month.
A boy steals your lunch.

options.name: Beat up to teach a lesson

description: You heard a loud bang in the area.
See that a house was robbed.
A revolutionary points a gun at you.
Violent civilians called you a 'fatass'.
Violent civilian questions your authority.
A revolutionist punched you.
Your militia car was destroyed by a group of vandals.
A Molotov cocktail is thrown at you.

options.name: Shoot at it in the air

description: A civilian tries to stab you.
You are being shot at by civilians, and you hide your cover.
Your colleague caught you drunk driving. Too much Rachiu, I guess.
A group of protestors is blocking the road.
A colleague of yours is seen protesting.
You find a rural boy stealing food.
Citizen screams obcenities about Ceaușescu.
A foreigner is lost.
A wealthy foreign driver is driving down the road.
You see a lady of the night walking down the street.
A repeat offender still punches random people (probably mentally unstable).
A boy steals bread from a bakery.
A mad citizen is trying to kill your colleague.
You are caught in a crossfire between the army and protestors.
The military starts shooting at you because they think you are with protestors.
There is an explosion nearby.
A child is skipping school.
You check a person's documents, and it turns out he is an illegal Moldavian immigrant.
Someone plays anti-communist radio with a high volume.
A mob attacks you.
A bullet from an unknown source hits your hand.
A mob chases you down the street.
You are trapped in an ally between 2 sets of the mob.
An armed mob is making their way through the streets and is coming for you!
A rabble of looters has forced their way into a bread store. As you try to apprehend the leader, he pulls out a kitchen knife!
Your car breaks down during your shift. It looks like someone had sabotaged it before you entered.

options.name: Call in a favor at the station

description: You go through your pockets and notice your wallet is missing! Whoever nicked it can't be far, though…
Gunfire erupts from a broken window in the nearby apartment complex and shatters the windshield of your car! Whoever is in there is aiming to kill.
A drunk charges you brandishing a broken bottle!
You hear a shout behind you. Noi suntem poporul! Before you even know what's happening, a masked man charges you with a makeshift club.
A young woman asks for your assistance.
Several men armed with crowbars and lead pipes charge your vehicle, aiming to destroy it!
While on the way back to your car, a group of kids brandishing sharp objects flee the scene. They have punctured one of your tires!
A crackdown goes awry. A military squadron opens fire on a group of protestors, which shoot back with their hidden weapons. Bullets barely miss your head as you're stuck in the crossfire!
You make your way towards a protest spiraling out of hand. You barely manage to see the torn flags being waved as an armored personnel carrier charges straight for the crowd, but you're in the way.
During a local university crackdown, some of your fellow police officers join the protestors and attack you!

Following orders from the station, you and several other police officers set up a barricade to block the streets. The protesters, however, have been bolstered by workers from the industrial zones and now outnumber you five to one.
Thank you for arresting a thief. A store owner hands you over a piece of chicken. Hunger-stricken eyes of nearby pedestrians focus on you…

options.name: Try to talk sense into them

description: You and several officers have been called to disperse a crowd. However, by the time you arrive, it has already turned into a whole-blown rally, and people are not very happy to see the police.
A group of protestors that have barricaded themselves in a nearby restaurant pelt you with stones and any sharp objects they have at hand when you come close.
Rubbish equipment! Just as you prepare to fire a warning shot at a wild-eyed man approaching you, your pistol jams!
While fending off the Revolutionaries from a governmental building, you and your colleagues hold out long enough for the army to arrive. To your horror, they join the rally.
You arrest a young man that has been suspected of showing support to the revolutionaries. As you take him away, his family members block your path.
A fellow officer approaches you and says he has evidence that you're preparing treason against the Communist party. A small bribe would keep him silent, or so he says…
You see a group of youngsters cutting the communist star out of the Romanian flag.
Factory workers have entered the city and are clashing with the military.
A sniper has taken up position on a nearby roof of an apartment building.
Following the commotion after Ceaușescu's speech, you haven't been able to redeem your daily ration of bread. Hunger starts kicking in bad…
You hear someone screaming for help from a nearby alley. You rush towards the origin of the noise, only to be met by a group of men wielding lead pipes with malicious intent.
The stress of police work is rapidly catching up with you. Luckily for you, the narcotics you confiscated from an addict last weak might take the edge off...
The violent protesting has kept the police force working overtime, desperately trying to restore order. But the adrenaline can only stave off your lack of sleep for so long…
You arrest a man who was caught stealing bread last week. Just as you cuff him, his wife rushes you with a pair of scissors.

options.name: Let go of the man and escape

description: It looks like the civil unrest is spreading a lot farther than you thought. Your younger brothers have been seen joining a rally against the police!
Your alcohol dependence has grown steadily worse this year. During your shift, an overwhelming urge starts taking hold of you while you're driving.
It looks like you weren't well prepared for dealing with the last days of December. The ice-cold winds blow straight through your uniform.

options.name: Take time to find a coat

description: Sheltering behind your riot shield, you are horrified to spot a familiar shape amongst the rocks and pieces of debris being thrown at you: A Grenade!
As you drive towards the location of a new protest, you swear you hear a ticking sound coming from under your seat…

options.name: Stop the car and walk out

description: Following a scuffle with a substance abuser, you notice that you have lost your badge! If word gets out about this at the station, there'll be hell to pay.
You come across two people arguing about the communist regime. As their argument grows ever more heated, an uneasy tension rises in the street.

While driving towards the home of a suspected activist, you are startled by the sound of your tires bursting. It looks like someone has sprinkled nails and glass shards here, anticipating your arrival.
